mapper.select: select l.lno,l.l_m_id ,m.username,l.l_g_gno,g.gname,g.actionstatus,g.lowestprice,g.enddate,f.f_name from likes l join member m on l.l_m_id = m.id join goods g on l.l_g_gno = g.gno join goodsfile f on l.l_g_gno = f.f_g_gno where l.l_m_id = #{l_m_id} and f.f_name != "" order by lno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
select * from goods g join likes l on g.gno = l.lno where gno=#{gno}
mapper.update: update goods g join likes l on g.gno = l.l_g_gno set glike = glike -1 where l.l_g_gno= #{l_g_gno}
